description: Complete system overview detailing the construction company's core operational components, architecture, and key business logic components
Detailed documentation of the estimate request system's dual-channel notification flow, timezone handling, and email template management
Comprehensive documentation of data structures for projects, services, and estimates including relationships and category hierarchies
Documentation of the project portfolio system including image sequence management, location tracking, and project classification structure
Detailed documentation of the construction service hierarchy, category relationships, and domain-specific service descriptions
